name: Monkey
body:
Personal Home/Office Automation Monkey
======================================

I'm teaching my monkey to do all the chores that I don't like.  Every now and
then I teach it a trick, but for now, here's what it can do...

Note: Not everything is already published, some things are implemented as crude
Rake scripts, using "monkey" only as a Ruby library.

**Accounting**

- parses and generates human-readable [ledger](http://ledger-cli.org) files

**Banking**

- does online-banking via HBCI (using aqbanking-cli)
- imports bank statements in CSV format

**Small-business management**

- keeps track of my customers and suppliers
- generates time-sheets for contract work
- generates invoices ready to send

**E-mail processing**

- received invoices to account for business expenses
- time-recording reports for invoice generation

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/ustuehler/monkey.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/ustuehler/monkey)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
